name: part_010
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】バーチャルアイドルが踊ってみた！ #かなたんしか勝たん【天音かなた⧸ホロライブ】 [_pC9JaHyyjQ]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_010.mov

subtitles.original: 泣き顔も　黙る夜も　揺れる笑顔も
subtitles.english: The crying faces, the silent nights, and the swaying smiles

subtitles.original: いつまでも　いつまでも
subtitles.english: Forever and ever

subtitles.original: 胸の中にあるもの　いつか見えなくなるもの
subtitles.english: The things in my heart that will one day disappear from sight

subtitles.original: それは側にいること　いつも思い出して
subtitles.english: Always remember that it's about being by your side

subtitles.original: 君の中にあるもの　距離の中にある鼓動を
subtitles.english: The things within you, the heartbeat within the distance

subtitles.original: 恋をしたの貴方の　指の混ざり　頬の香り
subtitles.english: I fell in love with you, the touch of your fingers, the scent of your cheeks

subtitles.original: 夫婦を超えてゆけ
subtitles.english: Go beyond being a married couple

subtitles.original: 二人を超えてゆけ
subtitles.english: Go beyond being two people

subtitles.original: 一人を超えてゆけ
subtitles.english: Go beyond being alone

subtitles.original: ライブもいよいよ終盤になってきましたー！
subtitles.english: The live show is finally reaching its final stages!

subtitles.original: みんなまだまだ盛り上がっていけるよなー！
subtitles.english: Everyone, we can still keep this excitement going, right?!

subtitles.original: 特者生存ワンダラダー！！
subtitles.english: Special-Selection-Survival Wanderader!!

subtitles.original: なぬっ！？　ビシッ　ボリッ　バシッ
subtitles.english: What?! (Snap, crackle, pop sounds)

subtitles.original: ツッコミも冴えて　本日快晴
subtitles.english: My retorts are sharp and it's a clear day

subtitles.original: マボロ…　ギュムッ　バキッ
subtitles.english: Illusion... (Squishing and snapping sounds)

subtitles.original: 手にする全部　It's mine!　くれくれ
subtitles.english: Everything in my hands, it's mine! Gimme gimme

subtitles.original: 適度にがんばろうか（ぜっか？）
subtitles.english: Let's do our best moderately (Is that so?)

subtitles.original: そんなんだっていいけどさ
subtitles.english: Well, that's fine too

subtitles.original: 必死にがんばろうか（そうか！）
subtitles.english: Let's do our best desperately (I see!)

subtitles.original: それが僕らしいよな
subtitles.english: That's just like me, isn't it?

subtitles.original: ダサすぎじゃねえんだわ！
subtitles.english: I'm not that uncool!

subtitles.original: そんで貧ぼっちゃじゃねえんだわ！
subtitles.english: And I'm not a poor brat!

subtitles.original: うん万事がバッチリイケてるに決まってる！
subtitles.english: Yeah, everything's bound to go perfectly!

subtitles.original: (are you?) かなたちゃん☆
subtitles.english: (are you?) Kanata-chan☆

subtitles.original: どどん！前進上等！ちゃんと歓迎して
subtitles.english: Boom! Moving forward is fine! Welcome me properly

subtitles.original: (wonder-la-der-la) 高まれ
subtitles.english: (wonder-la-der-la) Let it swell

subtitles.original: 海空創造　ちゃんと驚嘆して
subtitles.english: Creation of sea and sky, be properly amazed

subtitles.original: (wonder-la-der-la) 興奮しよう
subtitles.english: (wonder-la-der-la) Let's get excited

subtitles.original: 僕が言うんだもん　本当にするんだもん
subtitles.english: Because I say so, I'll really do it

subtitles.original: 現実超えろ未来　あー！
subtitles.english: Go beyond reality, future, ah!

subtitles.original: 弱点も平気　スイッチでランチャー！
subtitles.english: Weaknesses are fine, switch on the launcher!

subtitles.original: すなわち特者生存ワンダランタDAY
subtitles.english: In other words, a special-selection-survival Wanderanta DAY

subtitles.original: (wonder-la-der-la) 楽しもう
subtitles.english: (wonder-la-der-la) Let's enjoy it

subtitles.original: 面白がれること探しまえ　oven?
subtitles.english: Search for things to find amusing, oven?

subtitles.original: 返事聞かせてくれ！
subtitles.english: Let me hear your response!

subtitles.original: 右左なんかじゃない
subtitles.english: It's not about left or right

subtitles.original: 決めつけて一直線
subtitles.english: I've decided on a straight line

subtitles.original: つまり企てらんだら発射オーライが
subtitles.english: In other words, if you plan it out, it's all systems go

subtitles.original: ワクワクすんぜしぇー！
subtitles.english: I'm getting excited, shee!

subtitles.original: 初見のみんな、天音かなたは裏切らない。
subtitles.english: Everyone seeing me for the first time, Amane Kanata won't betray you.

subtitles.original: 歌も配信も頑張るからまた遊びに来てね。
subtitles.english: I'll do my best in singing and streaming, so please come visit again.

subtitles.original: いつも見てくれるへい民のみんな…大好き。
subtitles.english: To all the Heimin who always watch me... I love you.

subtitles.original: 「何だよそんなこと言っちゃダメだ、おばか！」
subtitles.english: “What? You can't say things like that, you dummy!”

subtitles.original: うわ〜すごい！ありがと〜
subtitles.english: Wow, amazing! Thank you~

subtitles.original: 日々これ騒然で go my way!
subtitles.english: Being tumultuous every day, go my way!

subtitles.original: 虎視眈々でいたいんだもん
subtitles.english: Because I want to be vigilant

subtitles.original: だって意気揚々いいだもん
subtitles.english: Because being high-spirited is good

subtitles.original: 全方位におっふりアンテナ張っていなくちゃ！
subtitles.english: I've gotta keep my 'offu' antenna raised in all directions!

subtitles.original: いつでも心はちゃんと純粋で
subtitles.english: My heart is always properly pure

subtitles.original: (wonder-la-der-la) いたいな好奇心は絶えず熱心で
subtitles.english: (wonder-la-der-la) I want my curiosity to be constantly fervent

subtitles.original: (wonder-la-der-la) いたいなって
subtitles.english: (wonder-la-der-la) I want to be...

subtitles.original: 言い聞かせるんだ　調子に乗ったら
subtitles.english: I tell myself, if I get carried away...

subtitles.original: すぐ飽きられちゃうから　あー！
subtitles.english: I'll be forgotten quickly, ah!

subtitles.original: タイトロープもどんとこいっせ
subtitles.english: Bring on the tightrope walk

subtitles.original: (wonder-la-der-la) すなわち特者生存ワンダランタDAY
subtitles.english: (wonder-la-der-la) In other words, a special-selection-survival Wanderanta DAY

subtitles.original: (wonder-la-der-la) しがみつけ
subtitles.english: (wonder-la-der-la) Cling on

subtitles.original: ”努力とは最後まで諦めないこと”
subtitles.english: “Effort means not giving up until the very end”

subtitles.original: メモっておいて！
subtitles.english: Note it down!

subtitles.original: ホントはbaby　自信なんかないよ
subtitles.english: To tell the truth, baby, I have no confidence

subtitles.original: ホントはbaby　不安ばっかで泣きそうさ
subtitles.english: To tell the truth, baby, I'm just full of anxiety and feel like crying

subtitles.original: でもねbaby　挫けないって決めたの
subtitles.english: But you see, baby, I've decided not to be discouraged

subtitles.original: だからbaby
subtitles.english: That's why, baby

subtitles.original: 挑戦したいよ　未開の天地　無限のフィールドで！
subtitles.english: I want to challenge myself in uncharted lands and infinite fields!
